title: 1 1 "Romance Dawn" Marc Jobst Teleplay by: Matt Owens &Steven Maeda August 31, 2023(2023-08-31)
transformers_text: 1 1 Romance Dawn Marc Job st Tele play by Matt Owens Steven Maeda August 31 2023 2023 08 31 Following the execution of King of the Pirates Gold Roger pirates take to the seas to search for his legendary hidden treasure the One Piece Twenty two years later Monkey D Luffy is one of those searching for the treasure As a child Luffy unwittingly ate the Gum Gum Fruit a Devil Fruit that gives him elasticity powers He winds up on the ship of pirate captain Al vida Luffy defeats Al vida and escapes with her cabin boy Ko by who dreams of becoming a Marine Luffy and Ko by sail to a Marine base in Shells Town to get a map of the Grand Line a treacherous route believed to house the One Piece The pirate hunter Roro no a Zoro is arrested for fighting Helm ep po son of Marine Captain Morgan but is freed by Luffy Nami a thief who also wants the map helps Luffy steal from Morgan's safe Zoro helps them defeat Morgan and the trio escape on a ship while Ko by remains behind to enlist with the Marines
